name: Cementerio de la Recoleta
description:
The second piece of the Baires collection inspired by places in Buenos Aires

The Tomb of Liliana Crociati, a 26-year-old young woman who drowned. Her parents designed a tomb for her in a neo-Gothic style, with large stained glass windows that let in a lot of light. The tomb contains a plaque with a poem in Italian, composed by her father, and a life-size green bronze statue of Liliana, with her hand resting on the head of her beloved dog Sabu, who died the same day than her.

-

La Tumba de Liliana Crociati, una joven de 26 años que se ahogó. Sus padres le diseñaron una tumba de estilo neogótico, con grandes vidrieras que dejaban entrar mucha luz. La tumba contiene una placa con un poema en italiano, compuesto por su padre, y una estatua de bronce verde de tamaño natural de Liliana, con la mano apoyada en la cabeza de su amado perro Sabu, que murió el mismo día que ella.
